website_summaries.verdict: Clearly the best double boiler by a wide margin, but the price is steep. Consider if you need this much from a double broiler.
pros: Beautiful, sturdy piece that arrives wonderfully packaged and does everything short of cook for you
cons: This double broiler might cost too much to dislike
It's a race horse and the rest in the field are donkeys

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is an elegant addition to my kitchen. I don't use a double boiler frequently, but when you need one, this is the one to have. One caution is that you really have to give it plenty of time for the inner porcelain container to heat up. It can take a long time to thicken if you add all the ingredients to a cold pan. I've made 7-minute frosting, custard, lemon curd -- all delish!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: I love All-Clad and had wanted a double boiler set with a ceramic (not stainless) insert. This arrived quickly and in pristine condition ... carefully packaged, complete with a cloth cover for the pan. I've used it once to make custard. Turned out great BUT I realize the ceramic insert does such a good job of keeping the heat down, that it took me longer to make than I'm used to (took longer to thicken as ceramic doesn't get as hot as steel). Having said that, this is a great buy and I'm so glad I found it. Will do wonders for ensuring I don't ruin sauces by overheating. Love it. Well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Burgess McKellum

customer_reviews.title: Excellent essential tool for any kitchen with multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: I have many All Clad and love them all including this one. I use the pot without the double boiler most of the time. The ceramic double boiler is okay, but heavy, not crazy about it. Still, this is a good tool for any kitchen. This size of the pot is perfect for any small volume job and performs like all All Clad.
customer_reviews.author: oRgaNicTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality, very nice look
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, very nice look. My only problem is that not both pots can be used on an inductive cook-top, which I expected from the item description. Only the external part is ferromagnetic. Otherwise, everything is excellent and I would give the five star rating if I did not care about that detail.

customer_reviews.title: We like this set very much.
customer_reviews.text: Great set. The pot and boiler are both well made. The boiler is especially nice (even for All-Clad). Its extremely heavy (lots of thermal mass) so it heats up and cools down slowly. This makes melting chocolate or stirring up a suspension much easier.

customer_reviews.title: insert is too heavy

Right now it wouldn't be a big deal, but I want this pan to last forever; when I'm 80 years old, I'm not going to want to risk injuring my wrist just lifting a double boiler insert. I don't know why they don't offer the option of a metal insert; seems crazy.

product_meta.title: All-Clad 42025 Stainless Steel 3-Ply Bonded Dishwasher Safe Sauce Pan with Porcelain Double Boiler and Cookware Lid, 2-Quart, Silver - 8400000266
product_meta.description: Expertly melt chocolate, whisk up egg-based sauces, or keep gravy warm with this All-Clad Stainless 42025 2-Quart sauce pan with double boiler. Its porcelain insert nests inside the saucepan, creating indirect heat—perfect for foods that have a tendency to seize or separate over direct heat. The saucepan can also be used on its own to reheat, cook, or make sauces. All-Clad’s Stainless 3-ply cookware features a thick-gauge aluminum core that attracts heat fast, while the addition of stainless steel ensures even heat distribution for consistent results across the entire cooking surface, all the way to the rim. Even more, its stainless-steel interior with a starburst finish offers natural stick resistance, letting you know when food is ready to release, and it won’t react with ingredients, so there’s no risk of food picking up a metallic taste. Made in the USA, this stainless-steel cookware offers warp-resistant strength and dishwasher-safe convenience, plus it can be used on any cooktop, including induction. Discover what it means to cook with All-Clad’s most popular cookware collection–All-Clad Stainless is a classic choice for anyone who loves to cook.

Highly polished cooking surface with starburst finish offers stick resistance and easy maintenance, plus won’t react with food
Contoured stainless-steel handles permanently secured with stainless-steel rivets; capacity etched on base; flat stainless-steel lid
Oven- and broiler-safe up to 600 degrees F (without lid); induction compatible; limited lifetime warranty; Made in USA
Double boiler with 2-Quart stainless-steel saucepan and 1.5-Quart porcelain insert; gently transfers heat for expertly melting chocolate, making custards, or cooking delicate sauces
